gov.sandia.cf.application.impl

Class GlobalApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.sandia.cf.application.AApplication
      • gov.sandia.cf.application.impl.GlobalApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IApplication, IGlobalApplication

    public class GlobalApplication
extends AApplication
implements IGlobalApplication
    Global Application manager for methods that are not specific to credibility features (like PIRT, PCMM,...)
    Author:
    Didier Verstraete
